description: Returns the seconds part (0 ... 59) of a time t.
Returns the month of a time.
Returns the day of the month.
Returns the year of a time.
Returns the day of a time as a value between 1 and 366.
Returns the seconds of the day.
Returns the seconds of a time t that have elapsed since 1.1.1970, 00:00 (UTC).

defines.definition: time setPeriod(time t, unsigned second [, unsigned milli])
time setTime(time t,unsigned year,unsigned month,unsigned day[,unsigned hour[,unsigned minute[,unsigned second[,unsigned milli[,bool day-light-saving]]]]])
description: Sets a time to the value specified in the argument.

defines.definition: time makeTime(unsigned year,unsigned month,unsigned day[,unsigned hour[,unsigned minute[,unsigned second[,unsigned milli[,bool daylightsaving]]]]])
description: Returns a time or alert time in the internal time format.

defines.definition: string formatTime(string format, time t [, string milliFormat])
description: Returns the time in a particular format.

defines.definition: string formatTimeUTC(string format, time t [, string milliFormat])

description: Returns the difference between local time and GMT.
